name: Speech is Not a Game
description: Hate speech is a constant issue throughout the world, and has only become a larger problem with the advent of social media and other online services, such as video games. “Speech is Not a Game” seeks to illustrate the severity of this problem by taking the form of three mini-games. Typography is featured predominantly, which puts more emphasis on the extremely hateful words, phrases, and remarks that traumatize many. Your goal as the player is to erase, push away, and destroy any hateful content presented using the arrow keys and spacebar.
